Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Bejewel \Be*jew"el\, v. t. [imp. & p. p. {Bejeweled} or {Bejewelled}; p. pr. & vb. n. {Bejeweling} or {Bejewelling}.] To ornament with a jewel or with jewels; to spangle. ``Bejeweled hands.'' --Thackeray. [1913 Webster] ||
bejeweled adj : covered with beads or jewels or sequins [syn: {beaded}, {beady}, {bejewelled}, {bespangled}, {gemmed}, {jeweled}, {jewelled}, {sequined}, {spangled}, {spangly}]
